title: wine_Domaine_de_l'A_2012__Castillon_Côtes_de_Bordeaux
text:
Unnamed: 0: 129288.
country: France.
description: Ripe, soft and very drinkable, this has a generous structure that cushions the tannins with rounded black fruits. The acidity and the warm, generous character of the 80% Merlot and 20% Cabernet Franc blend net a fine representation of the fruity 2012s. This is Bordeaux consultant Stéphane Derenoncourt's home turf. Wooden fermenters and 16 months in barrel (40% new) necessitate time, so drink from 2016..
designation: .
